response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I believe this product would also be of great significance to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true value and also compensates me fairly. Therefore, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if you wish to discuss alternative payment terms. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of creating a mutually beneficial relationship.", "product_price": 950000}
